table.name: vtiger_railstation
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_railstation` ( `railstationid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `railstation_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`railstationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_railstationcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_railstationcf` ( `railstationid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`railstationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
